description: "A Japanese Buddhist map (or copy of one) with the distinctive triangular land mass (wide at the top, narrow at the bottom) and the central ‘whirlpool’ Lake Anavatapta (aka Lake Anotatta). Southeast Asia is shown as a scattering of light grey islands."
title: "Map   of   Asia   and   Europe,   presumably   based   on   Buddhist   or   Tibetan   Sources"
